title: Tweet Card
description: A card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.
author: dillionverma

body.raw:
<ComponentPreview name="tweet-card-demo" />

<Steps>

### Installation

```bash
npm install react-tweet
```

### Installation React Server Component (Next.js 13+):

Copy and paste the following code into your project.

<ComponentSource name="tweet-card" />

### Installation Client Side

Copy and paste the following code into your project.

<ComponentSource name="client-tweet-card" />

</Steps>

## Usage

To render on server side using RSC (Next.js 13):

```tsx
import { TweetCard } from "@/components/magicui/tweet-card.tsx";

export default async function App() {
  return <TweetCard id="1441032681968212480" />;
}
```

To render on client side:

```tsx
"use client";

import { ClientTweetCard } from "@/components/magicui/client-tweet-card.tsx";

export default function App() {
  return <ClientTweetCard id="1441032681968212480" />;
}
```

## Examples

### Tweet Card With Image Carousel

<ComponentPreview name="tweet-card-images" />

### Tweet Card With Meta URL Preview

<ComponentPreview name="tweet-card-meta-preview" />

## Props

### ClientTweetCard

| Prop | Type   | Description                     |
| ---- | ------ | ------------------------------- |
| id   | string | The id of the tweet to display. |

### TweetCard

| Prop | Type   | Description                     |
| ---- | ------ | ------------------------------- |
| id   | string | The id of the tweet to display. |

## Credits

This component is built on top of [React Tweet](https://react-tweet.vercel.app/).

{ Suspense } from "react";\r
import {\r
  enrichTweet,\r
  type EnrichedTweet,\r
  type TweetProps,\r
  type TwitterComponents,\r
} from "react-tweet";\r
import { getTweet, type Tweet } from "react-tweet/api";\r
\r
import { cn } from "@/lib/utils";\r
\r
interface TwitterIconProps {\r
  className?: string;\r
  [key: string]: any;\r
}\r
const Twitter = ({ className, ...props }: TwitterIconProps) => (\r
  <svg\r
    stroke="currentColor"\r
    fill="currentColor"\r
    strokeWidth="0"\r
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"\r
    height="1em"\r
    width="1em"\r
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"\r
    className={className}\r
    {...props}\r
  >\r
    <g>\r
      <path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path>\r
      <path d="M22.162 5.656a8.384 8.384 0 0 1-2.402.658A4.196 4.196 0 0 0 21.6 4c-.82.488-1.719.83-2.656 1.015a4.182 4.182 0 0 0-7.126 3.814 11.874 11.874 0 0 1-8.62-4.37 4.168 4.168 0 0 0-.566 2.103c0 1.45.738 2.731 1.86 3.481a4.168 4.168 0 0 1-1.894-.523v.052a4.185 4.185 0 0 0 3.355 4.101 4.21 4.21 0 0 1-1.89.072A4.185 4.185 0 0 0 7.97 16.65a8.394 8.394 0 0 1-6.191 1.732 11.83 11.83 0 0 0 6.41 1.88c7.693 0 11.9-6.373 11.9-11.9 0-.18-.005-.362-.013-.54a8.496 8.496 0 0 0 2.087-2.165z"></path>\r
    </g>\r
  </svg>\r
);\r
\r
const Verified = ({ className, ...props }: TwitterIconProps) => (\r
  <svg\r
    aria-label="Verified Account"\r
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"\r
    className={className}\r
    {...props}\r
  >\r
    <g fill="currentColor">\r
      <path d="M22.5 12.5c0-1.58-.875-2.95-2.148-3.6.154-.435.238-.905.238-1.4 0-2.21-1.71-3.998-3.818-3.998-.47 0-.92.084-1.336.25C14.818 2.415 13.51 1.5 12 1.5s-2.816.917-3.437 2.25c-.415-.165-.866-.25-1.336-.25-2.11 0-3.818 1.79-3.818 4 0 .494.083.964.237 1.4-1.272.65-2.147 2.018-2.147 3.6 0 1.495.782 2.798 1.942 3.486-.02.17-.032.34-.032.514 0 2.21 1.708 4 3.818 4 .47 0 .92-.086 1.335-.25.62 1.334 1.926 2.25 3.437 2.25 1.512 0 2.818-.916 3.437-2.25.415.163.865.248 1.336.248 2.11 0 3.818-1.79 3.818-4 0-.174-.012-.344-.033-.513 1.158-.687 1.943-1.99 1.943-3.484zm-6.616-3.334l-4.334 6.5c-.145.217-.382.334-.625.334-.143 0-.288-.04-.416-.126l-.115-.094-2.415-2.415c-.293-.293-.293-.768 0-1.06s.768-.294 1.06 0l1.77 1.767 3.825-5.74c.23-.345.696-.436 1.04-.207.346.23.44.696.21 1.04z" />\r
    </g>\r
  </svg>\r
);\r
\r
export const truncate = (str: string | null, length: number) => {\r
  if (!str || str.length <= length) return str;\r
  return \`\${str.slice(0, length - 3)}...\`;\r
};\r
\r
const Skeleton = ({\r
  className,\r
  ...props\r
}: React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>) => {\r
  return (\r
    <div\r
      className={cn("animate-pulse rounded-md bg-primary/10", className)}\r
      {...props}\r
    />\r
  );\r
};\r
\r
export const TweetSkeleton = ({\r
  className,\r
  ...props\r
}: {\r
  className?: string;\r
  [key: string]: any;\r
}) => (\r
  <div\r
    className={cn(\r
      "flex h-full max-h-max w-full min-w-[18rem] flex-col gap-2 rounded-lg border p-4",\r
      className,\r
    )}\r
    {...props}\r
  >\r
    <div className="flex flex-row gap-2">\r
      <Skeleton className="h-10 w-10 shrink-0 rounded-full" />\r
      <Skeleton className="h-10 w-full" />\r
    </div>\r
    <Skeleton className="h-20 w-full" />\r
  </div>\r
);\r
\r
export const TweetNotFound = ({\r
  className,\r
  ...props\r
}: {\r
  className?: string;\r
  [key: string]: any;\r
}) => (\r
  <div\r
    className={cn(\r
      "flex h-full w-full flex-col items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg border p-4",\r
      className,\r
    )}\r
    {...props}\r
  >\r
    <h3>Tweet not found</h3>\r
  </div>\r
);\r
\r
export const TweetHeader = ({ tweet }: { tweet: EnrichedTweet }) => (\r
  <div className="flex flex-row justify-between tracking-tight">\r
    <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">\r
      <a href={tweet.user.url} target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">\r
        <img\r
          title={\`Profile picture of \${tweet.user.name}\`}\r
          alt={tweet.user.screen_name}\r
          height={48}\r
          width={48}\r
          src={tweet.user.profile_image_url_https}\r
          className="overflow-hidden rounded-full border border-transparent"\r
        />\r
      </a>\r
      <div>\r
        <a\r
          href={tweet.user.url}\r
          target="_blank"\r
          rel="noreferrer"\r
          className="flex items-center whitespace-nowrap font-semibold"\r
        >\r
          {truncate(tweet.user.name, 20)}\r
          {tweet.user.verified ||\r
            (tweet.user.is_blue_verified && (\r
              <Verified className="ml-1 inline h-4 w-4 text-blue-500" />\r
            ))}\r
        </a>\r
        <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">\r
          <a\r
            href={tweet.user.url}\r
            target="_blank"\r
            rel="noreferrer"\r
            className="text-sm text-gray-500 transition-all duration-75"\r
          >\r
            @{truncate(tweet.user.screen_name, 16)}\r
          </a>\r
        </div>\r
      </div>\r
    </div>\r
    <a href={tweet.url} target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">\r
      <span className="sr-only">Link to tweet</span>\r
      <Twitter className="h-5 w-5 items-start text-[#3BA9EE] transition-all ease-in-out hover:scale-105" />\r
    </a>\r
  </div>\r
);\r
\r
export const TweetBody = ({ tweet }: { tweet: EnrichedTweet }) => (\r
  <div className="break-words leading-normal tracking-tighter">\r
    {tweet.entities.map((entity, idx) => {\r
      switch (entity.type) {\r
        case "url":\r
        case "symbol":\r
        case "hashtag":\r
        case "mention":\r
          return (\r
            <a\r
              key={idx}\r
              href={entity.href}\r
              target="_blank"\r
              rel="noopener noreferrer"\r
              className="text-sm font-normal text-gray-500"\r
            >\r
              <span>{entity.text}</span>\r
            </a>\r
          );\r
        case "text":\r
          return (\r
            <span\r
              key={idx}\r
              className="text-sm font-normal"\r
              dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: entity.text }}\r
            />\r
          );\r
      }\r
    })}\r
  </div>\r
);\r
\r
export const TweetMedia = ({ tweet }: { tweet: EnrichedTweet }) => (\r
  <div className="flex flex-1 items-center justify-center">\r
    {tweet.video && (\r
      <video\r
        poster={tweet.video.poster}\r
        autoPlay\r
        loop\r
        muted\r
        playsInline\r
        className="rounded-xl border shadow-sm"\r
      >\r
        <source src={tweet.video.variants[0].src} type="video/mp4" />\r
        Your browser does not support the video tag.\r
      </video>\r
    )}\r
    {tweet.photos && (\r
      <div className="relative flex transform-gpu snap-x snap-mandatory gap-4 overflow-x-auto">\r
        <div className="shrink-0 snap-center sm:w-2" />\r
        {tweet.photos.map((photo) => (\r
          <img\r
            key={photo.url}\r
            src={photo.url}\r
            title={"Photo by " + tweet.user.name}\r
            alt={tweet.text}\r
            className="h-64 w-5/6 shrink-0 snap-center snap-always rounded-xl border object-cover shadow-sm"\r
          />\r
        ))}\r
        <div className="shrink-0 snap-center sm:w-2" />\r
      </div>\r
    )}\r
    {!tweet.video &&\r
      !tweet.photos &&\r
      // @ts-ignore\r
      tweet?.card?.binding_values?.thumbnail_image_large?.image_value.url && (\r
        <img\r
          // @ts-ignore\r
          src={tweet.card.binding_values.thumbnail_image_large.image_value.url}\r
          className="h-64 rounded-xl border object-cover shadow-sm"\r
        />\r
      )}\r
  </div>\r
);\r
\r
export const MagicTweet = ({\r
  tweet,\r
  components,\r
  className,\r
  ...props\r
}: {\r
  tweet: Tweet;\r
  components?: TwitterComponents;\r
  className?: string;\r
}) => {\r
  const enrichedTweet = enrichTweet(tweet);\r
  return (\r
    <div\r
      className={cn(\r
        "relative flex h-full w-full max-w-[32rem] flex-col gap-2 overflow-hidden rounded-lg border p-4 backdrop-blur-md",\r
        className,\r
      )}\r
      {...props}\r
    >\r
      <TweetHeader tweet={enrichedTweet} />\r
      <TweetBody tweet={enrichedTweet} />\r
      <TweetMedia tweet={enrichedTweet} />\r
    </div>\r
  );\r
};\r
\r
/**\r
 * TweetCard (Server Side Only)\r
 */\r
export const TweetCard = async ({\r
  id,\r
  components,\r
  fallback = <TweetSkeleton />,\r
  onError,\r
  ...props\r
}: TweetProps & {\r
  className?: string;\r
}) => {\r
  const tweet = id\r
    ? await getTweet(id).catch((err) => {\r
        if (onError) {\r
          onError(err);\r
        } else {\r
          console.error(err);\r
        }\r
      })\r
    : undefined;\r
\r
  if (!tweet) {\r
    const NotFound = components?.TweetNotFound || TweetNotFound;\r
    return <NotFound {...props} />;\r
  }\r
\r
  return (\r
    <Suspense fallback={fallback}>\r
      <MagicTweet tweet={tweet} {...props} />\r
    </Suspense>\r
  );\r
};\r
\r
export default TweetCard;\r

client";\r
\r
import { TweetProps, useTweet } from "react-tweet";\r
\r
import {\r
  MagicTweet,\r
  TweetNotFound,\r
  TweetSkeleton,\r
} from "@/components/magicui/tweet-card";\r
\r
const ClientTweetCard = ({\r
  id,\r
  apiUrl,\r
  fallback = <TweetSkeleton />,\r
  components,\r
  fetchOptions,\r
  onError,\r
  ...props\r
}: TweetProps & { className?: string }) => {\r
  const { data, error, isLoading } = useTweet(id, apiUrl, fetchOptions);\r
\r
  if (isLoading) return fallback;\r
  if (error || !data) {\r
    const NotFound = components?.TweetNotFound || TweetNotFound;\r
    return <NotFound error={onError ? onError(error) : error} />;\r
  }\r
\r
  return <MagicTweet tweet={data} components={components} {...props} />;\r
};\r
\r
export default ClientTweetCard;\r
